    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vzrok - posledica</string>
            <string language="en">Cause - consequence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursache - Konsequenz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cause - conséquence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Causa - conseqüência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Causa - conseguenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αιτία - συνέπεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Causa - consecuencia</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Reševalec mora z razumevanjem prebrati besedilo in povezati vzrok in posledico.</string>
            <string language="en">Exercise to drill reading comprehension (connecting cause and suitable consequence).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">bralno razumevanje</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzrok</string>
            <string language="en">cause</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">posledica</string>
            <string language="en">consequence</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übung, zum des Leseerfassens (anschließende 
Ursache und verwendbare Konsequenz) zu bohren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercice pour forer la compréhension de lecture 
(cause se reliante et conséquence appropriée).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercício para perfurar a compreensão da 
leitura (causa conectando e conseqüência apropriada).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazione per perforare comprensione della 
lettura (causa di collegamento e conseguenza adatta).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκηση για να τρυπήσει την κατανόηση ανάγνωσης με 
τρυπάνι (συνδέοντας αιτία και κατάλληλη συνέπεια).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicio para perforar la comprensión de la 
lectura (causa que conecta y consecuencia conveniente).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konsequenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cause</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
